posts.post_title: T206 Jack Hannifin PSA 7.5!!  Highest graded 1 of 1!
posts.post_content:
For those of you collecting extremely high grade T206's!!  This one is EXTREMELY undervalued, currently selling for pennies on the dollar.  Just wanted to give a head's up in case anyone needed this beauty!
